text: Teraemi suryaka diptimana arau candraka jyotirmaya karaiche arau tara babe nirdista karaiche bibhinna manayila, yate tomaloke bachara ganana karaiba paraa arau samayara hicapa janiba paraa. Allahe e'ibora yathayatha bharae'i srsti karaiche. Te'om e'ibora nidarsana bisadabharae barnana karae ene sampradayara babe yisakale jane
